text: photo taken in 1918 Lo Hesse and Joachim von Seewitz (Sport & Salon, 14. February 1918) Lo Hesse (born August 6, 1889 Berlin, died 1983?) was a German dancer. ==Biography== She was the dancing partner of Joachim von Seewitz and was employed at the Staatsoper Berlin.Paul Nikolaus: Tänzerinnen. Mit 32 Abbildungen und 4 farbigen Zeichnungen von Ernst Stern, München, Delphin (1919). U.a. über Lo Hesse In 1919 she refused a commitment at the Vienna State Opera and went on tour to South America. Her biographical legacy is kept in the German Dance Archive Cologne. http://www.zuerichseeauktionen.ch/D/02_katalog/kat_18/varia_18_07.pdf She also worked as an actress and a model for Ernst Stern. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1980s deaths Category:Year of death uncertain Category:Dancers from Berlin Category:20th-century dancers Category:German actresses Category:20th-century German actresses
title: Lo Hesse
